Jan 25, 2018, 5:20 am
Knarlydawg
No war ……. unless that is what it takes to eradicate the cancerous vermin that have infested our nation and are driven to bring about it’s destruction with an insane fervor. This battle has been going on for quite a while now.
Jan 25, 2018, 5:44 am
Knarlydawg
BIN editors ………. how do I get rid of that damn enclosure that keeps that second video shrunk down so small ?
Jan 25, 2018, 6:28 am
We have reached the point in American history where all of our Constitutionally-regulated systems have broken down and our “freedoms” have been turned against us.  An example of this is “freedom of the press”.  We do not have a “free” press any longer (if we ever did).  These “mouthpieces” are controlled by just a handful of entities and corporations and together they propagandize and control what the sheeple think, do and say.  Therefore granting freedom to a controlled propaganda machine is contrary to the Constitution, but it continues and it will negatively influence our people and our country until it brings it down like a house of cards.
Our America has been turned on its head, creating dissension and hatred where none previously existed.  Gender wars (What is it?  Really now.), Race wars (were practically eliminated prior to Obama who with the help of the controlled media RECREATED a hatred which we had cured and banished.) to name but two.  Our country is PURPOSEFULLY being destroyed from within and we are being made to participate.
Everybody is offended.  Perception has replaced REALITY.  New groups are being targeted to hate and the masses continue to fall for this delusion.  We destroy ourselves for lack of understanding.
In just such a way Rome fell.  It was replaced by EMPIRE.  Americans have been led to believe that we are already an empire.  Ridiculous.  But soon, one will come who WILL make us exactly that.  We cannot be destroyed because we have nukes.  That is what separates us from Venezuela.  We will either be conquered or we will become an EMPIRE like Rome.  It matter not which happens as we all lose at that point.  Unlike Rome, the citizen will not enjoy freedoms in this New World Order.  It will be an oligarchy of the rich and powerful, of which the average citizen is not one.
I cannot tell you when this will happen or how it will all come down, but anyone who is aware can see the handwriting on the wall.  I am reminded that America does not appear in Bible prophecy and eventually Israel will stand alone.  Therefore, I would guess that regardless of which transpires as a replacement for America, we will not resemble our former selves at all.  We will become a new and terrible country.  I do not look forward to that day.
Take this for the warning that it is.  We are too powerful to fade away.  We will be transformed.  In all likelihood, into something NONE of us wants or desires.
Each generation wants to leave its mark on the future.  That is the persuasion which is always used.  It is being used now and the young of today have swallowed it hook, line and sinker.  They have been taught not to think, but to label those who are not part of their herd.  They have been taught to hurt and injure instead of logically reasoning their arguments.  They were “educated” to be followers while taught that they are leaders.  They are truly the LOST GENERATION.  It is not they who will lose this country, but their parent generation who allowed their most precious resource (their children and our future) to be corrupted and misled.
Let this stand as a signal to those who can still hear, think and reason.  It is coming and it is coming swiftly.  Do all that you can to retain what you have.  Store the knowledge while darkness reigns.  Protect who you can, while you can.  Repent and pray.  Remember to stand.
Watch ye therefore, and pray always, that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass, and to stand before the Son of man. – Luke 21:36
Jan 25, 2018, 8:57 am
Knarlydawg
Much truth in your comment ! Thank you.   I hope for a turn around for our nation but I hold in the back of my mind that what is happening is a sacrificial skin shedding, (throwing the mid-level Luci’s under the bus), by the deep Deep State Luciferians which tricks everyone into believing that a great cleansing has taken place.  Meanwhile the Luci’s come back on the scene with all new skins, looking like saviors with all the answers for the new NWO 2.0 ……….. Peace, Peace, Peace …… then comes sudden destruction !!
Jan 25, 2018, 1:47 pm
